title: Autoload libraries with alternate names
body:
I just configured my fresh downloaded 3.0.0 to use alternate library name in controller. Here is my code:

``` php
/*
| -------------------------------------------------------------------
|  Auto-load Libraries
| -------------------------------------------------------------------
| These are the classes located in the system/libraries folder
| or in your application/libraries folder.
|
| Prototype:
|
|   $autoload['libraries'] = array('database', 'email', 'session');
|
| You can also supply an alternative library name to be assigned
| in the controller:
|
|   $autoload['libraries'] = array('user_agent' => 'ua');
*/

$autoload['libraries'] = array();

// Load the basic libraries
$autoload['libraries'][] = 'database';
$autoload['libraries'][] = 'session';

// Load the user_agent for monitoring
$autoload['libraries']['user_agent'] = 'client';
```

The output is an error, it said: _Unable to load the requested class: Client_
